title: Troubleshoot User's Streaming Playback Issues
description: A user complains of constant buffering when trying to watch 4K content on their smart TV.

tasks.description: Identify the user and retrieve their recent playback session data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up logs showing low download bandwidth and multiple bitrate switches.

tasks.description: Run a diagnostic on the user's home network from the client-side app.
tasks.expected_outcome: The diagnostic confirms a slow internet connection speed, insufficient for 4K streaming.

tasks.description: Advise the user to check their internet speed, restart their router, or select a lower streaming quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, actionable troubleshooting steps to the user.
